title: Why does Black marker brawlers not feature the pirate announcer?
body:
Being the bilgewater featured game mode it seems odd not to have the bilgewater announcer who is unique to the event?
why is this?

replies.body: It's ok. He had GA. And oranges. Rito confirmed for Black Rose.
Probably because the announcer was Gangplank or one of his cohorts, and they are all dead now.
